title: T206 Carolina Brights Miller For Trade
author: soxinseven

posts.post_title: T206 Carolina Brights Miller For Trade
posts.post_content:
I have the following card for sale/trade. I'm looking for E94s in the PSA/SGC 2/3 grade range. Price is SOLD Check or Paypal gift. Regular Paypal add 3%.
                                       Thanks,
                                        Steve

Steve I'm not one to usually argue about what grade a card has received I usually say it is what it is but that looks under graded to me.  Seems like a resubmission might get you a 2.  If I had any e-94s I'd be all over this.
SGC got the grade right. The card has a small pinhole at the top. All the cardboard is still there so you can't see through it, but it's there.
Ahhhhh, see that's the voice of an honest man.  Thanks
Bump, card is now for sale as well...

Pm Sent, I will take it if still available.
Best,
Jeff
